name: sakura-restaurant-backend
description: Backend for Sakura China & Japan Restaurant

scripts.deploy:cron: node -e "const { exec } = require('child_process'); setInterval(() => { console.log(`[CRON] Esecuzione deploy:check alle ${new Date().toISOString()}`); exec('npm run deploy:check', (err, stdout, stderr) => { if (err) { console.error('[CRON ERROR]', err); return; } console.log('[CRON STDOUT]', stdout); console.error('[CRON STDERR]', stderr); }); }, 86400000)"
